personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.subtitle: Update your name and last name. No password required.
personalInfo.rfegInfo: Select Spain (ES) to enable RFEG handicap updates

security.title: Security Settings
security.subtitle: Update your email and/or password. Current password required.
security.currentPasswordHelp: Enter your current password to authorize changes
security.newPasswordPlaceholder: Leave empty to keep current password
security.newPasswordHelp: Must be at least 12 characters if changing

handicap.title: Handicap Management
handicap.rfegHelp: This will look up your handicap using your registered name in the RFEG database. If not found, you can provide a manual fallback above.
handicap.rfegOnlySpanish: RFEG updates only available for Spanish players
handicap.rfegInfoWithNationality: Your nationality is set to {{countryCode}}. Only players with Spanish nationality can update their handicap from RFEG.
handicap.rfegInfoNoNationality: To enable RFEG handicap updates, please set your nationality to Spain in your profile.

toasts.failedToUpdateHandicapRFEG: Failed to update handicap from RFEG. Please try again later.
toasts.firstNameTooShort: First name must be at least 2 characters.
toasts.lastNameTooShort: Last name must be at least 2 characters.
toasts.currentPasswordRequired: Current password is required to update security settings.
toasts.noSecurityChanges: No changes detected in email or password.
toasts.passwordTooShort: New password must be at least 8 characters.
toasts.passwordsDoNotMatch: New password and confirmation do not match.
toasts.passwordReused: Cannot reuse any of your last 5 passwords. Please choose a different password.
